text: Mário Aníbal Dias Sampaio Ramos (born 25 March 1972 in Nova Sintra, Angola) is a former Portuguese decathlete. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1994 |Ibero-American Championships |Mar del Plata, Argentina |bgcolor=gold|1st |Decathlon |7.431 pts W |- |1997 |World Championships |Athens, Greece |18th |Decathlon |7768 pts |- |1998 |European Indoor Championships |Valencia, Spain |11th |Heptathlon |5785 pts |- |rowspan=2|2000 |European Indoor Championships |Ghent, Belgium |5th |Heptathlon |5930 pts iNR |- |Olympic Games |Sydney, Australia |12th |Decathlon |8136 pts NR |- |rowspan=2|2001 |World Indoor Championships |Lisbon, Portugal |7th |Heptathlon |5867 pts |- |World Championships |Edmonton, Canada |12th |Decathlon |8155 pts |- |2002 |European Indoor Championships |Vienna, Austria |9th |Heptathlon |5836 pts |} ==External links== * *infopedia Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese decathletes Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Portugal Category:Portuguese people of Angolan descent
title: Mário Aníbal
